Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of team members to ensure capacity

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the severity of active blockers to reduce project risk

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize the total priority of features selected for the release

Name: minimize_sprint_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the difference between estimated and actual effort in the sprint backlog

Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Maximize the team's average velocity to improve throughput

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize stakeholder satisfaction as measured in the sprint review

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize the total project budget spent

Name: maximize_skill_coverage
Description: Maximize the coverage of required skills within the team

Name: minimize_task_duration
Description: Minimize the time taken to complete tasks

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of achieved sprint goals
